title: Rail waybills and shipping orders
dataVerified: Shipper, consignee, railway, car number, cargo description
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Waybill status (issued/delivered). Link to railway company system (parties and carriers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered cargo details. Domain binding verifies railway company. Intermodal shipping verification. Cross-border rail freight (USA/Canada/Mexico, EU).
